text: CIPM confers fellowship on WACOT’s Umar Mohammed The Chartered Institute of Personnel Management of Nigeria (CIPM) has recognised the commitment and dedication of the General Manager, Human Resources, at WACOT Rice Limited (WRL), Dr. Umar Faruk Mohammed, with its highest individual award. At its 55th International Conference and Exhibition Gala & Awards Night, held at the International Conference Centre, Abuja, recently, the CIPM conferred Mohammed with a Fellowship, acknowledging his immense contributions to human relations practices and development in Nigeria. It was a honour well deserved for Mohammed, whose career journey has been marked by exceptional contributions to human resources management across diverse sectors, including Manufacturing, Engineering, FMCG, Agro Allied, Consulting, and Law. As General Manager of Human Resources overseeing WACOT Rice Limited, a TGI Group company, Mohammed has played a crucial role in steering the company’s human capital management and aligning them with global best practices. Chairman of WACOT Rice, Farouk Gumel, felicitated with Mohammed on his Fellowship, noting that it is well deserved. He said: “We take immense pride in Dr. Umar Mohammed’s conferment as a Fellow by the CIPM. We thank CIPM for recognising one of our own.” Also, commenting on the conferment, Managing Director of WACOT Rice, Neeraj Kumar, said: “This recognition not only underscores his standing as a leader in the HR domain, but also reflects positively on TGI Group’s commitment to nurturing and empowering its talented workforce.” The honouree expressed delight with the recognition, saying, “I am deeply honoured to receive the award (FCIPM) from the CIPM. “This recognition attests to what is possible in a supportive environment that encourages professional growth and excellence. I, therefore, say a big thank you to the leadership team at WACOT Rice and TGI Group. This award renews my commitment to continuing the pursuit of excellence in my capacity and contributing to the success of TGI Group.” Get the latest news delivered straight to your inbox every day of the week.
